branchCategory.name: 10-SV
branchCategory.description: <P>The 10-SV Clean Room series employs a multi-connector instead of the conventional lead wires for internal manifold wiring. By connecting each block with a connector, changes to manifold stations have been simplified. Cassette base type manifolds offer the ultimate in flexibility. Manifold sections can be added using a simple release mechanism. Conventional tie-rod base type manifolds are also available. The use of 34 pin connectors allows up to 16 stations with double solenoids. </P>

branchItem.name: 10-SV1000-4000, 5-Port Solenoid Valves, Clean Series
branchItem.description: <P>The 10-SV Clean Room series employs a multi-connector instead of the conventional lead wires for internal manifold wiring. By connecting each block with a connector, changes to manifold stations have been simplified. Cassette base type manifolds offer the ultimate in flexibility. Manifold sections can be added using a simple release mechanism. Conventional tie-rod base type manifolds are also available. The use of 34 pin connectors allows up to 16 stations with double solenoids. </P>
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Clean room series <LI>Operating pressure range: -100kPa to 0.7MPa <LI>Response time ms (at 0.5MPa): 18 or less <LI>Coil rated voltage: 12, 24VDC <LI>Ambient & fluid temperature: -10 to 50° C <LI>Enclosure: IP67 (based on IEC60529) </LI></UL>

branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Tie rod base, EX500 type manifold base for SV1000 valves <LI>Decentralized serial wiring <LI>IP67 protection <LI>Maximum 16 stations available as standard <LI>Optional DIN rail mount <LI>Clean room series</LI></UL>
